events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly.
The customer has requested a refund due to product sizing issues and has opened a refund case.
The case has been assigned to customer agent Alice Johnson for follow-up and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want a refund so I can process it quickly?
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the jacket is much too small for me even though I ordered my usual size.
Thank you for the info. We can process a full refund once you return the jacket. I will send you return instructions by email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund instructions. I will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and issued the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully completed and no further issues were reported, I am closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
